Interface SquareFactory

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Square>
All Known Implementing Classes:
IntSquareFactory, PairSquareFactory
public interface SquareFactory
extends java.lang.Iterable<Square>

A factory for creating squares on a chess board

              int rank)
Create a new square

Returns:
the new square
Requires:

isSquare

boolean isSquare(int file,
                 int rank)
Check whether (file, rank) represents a square on the chess board

Parameters:
file - The x-coordinate, may be any integer
rank - The y-coordinate, may be any integer
Returns:
true if file in [1..MAX_FILE] and rank in [1..MAX_RANK]
